articles.description: Day three of the Milan-Cortina Winter Olympics, with Team GB's Kirsty Muir and Mia Brookes chasing medals.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026 LIVE: Day three - watch BBC - medals, results, TV stream & updates from Milan-Cortina

articles.description: Seattle Seahawks linebacker Derick Hall doesn't just feel blessed to win the Super Bowl. He feels blessed to be alive after being born with a 1% chance of survival.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2026: Derick Hall 'blessed' to win title with Seattle Seahawks

articles.description: Why have Liverpool gone from mentality monsters to a side there for the taking?
articles.title: Late goals are destroying Liverpool's season and the answers aren't obvious

articles.description: Milan-Cortina 2026 organisers say they are "looking closely" at the issue of Olympic medals breaking after several athletes suffered issues with their prizes.
articles.title: 2026 Winter Olympics broken medals: Milan-Cortina organisers look into matter

articles.description: Who impressed and who has the most to do after a transfixing opening weekend of the Six Nations?
articles.title: Six Nations 2026: Five talking points from the opening round

articles.description: Lando Norris' confidence is "even higher" for the 2026 Formula 1 season after winning his first drivers' title last year, McLaren Racing chief executive officer Zak Brown says.
articles.title: Lando Norris: McLaren driver's confidence 'higher than ever'

articles.description: Eddie Howe says there is "no doubt in my mind" he is still the right manager for Newcastle despite one win in eight games.
articles.title: Newcastle: Eddie Howe would resign as manager if he had doubts

articles.description: Michael Leask and George Munsey star as Scotland beat World Cup debutants Italy by 73 runs at Eden Gardens.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Michael Leask & George Munsey star as Scotland beat debutants Italy

articles.description: Ukrainian skeleton racer Vladyslav Heraskevych wears a helmet with images of people killed in the war in his home country during a Winter Olympics training session in Cortina.
articles.title: Ukraine skeleton racer wears helmet with images of people killed in war

articles.description: Freestyle skier Kirsty Muir misses out on Great Britain's first medal of the 2026 Winter Olympics with a fourth-place finish in the women's slopestyle.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Kirsty Muir wins bronze for GB in slopestyle
